units.title: Detachment of hPSCs with Accutase
units.text: RC17, H9, and HS1001 hPSCs were detached from the culture dish with 0.5 mM Accutase (Thermo Fisher Scientiﬁc, #A1110501) and Organoid cryosectioning and immunoﬂuorescence.
units.rationale: Describes how pluripotent stem cells are harvested as single cells.

units.title: Fixation of organoids in paraformaldehyde
units.text: Both conventional and silkprepared as a concentrated single cell suspension (20,000 cells/µL in iPS Brew VM organoids were ﬁxed in 4% paraformaldehyde for 5 h at 4 °
units.rationale: Specifies the fixation step for downstream analysis.

units.title: DAB immunostaining primary antibody detection
units.text: For diaminobenzidine (DAB) staining, the sections were incubated with secondary biotinylated horse antibodies diluted (1:200, Vector Laboratories) for 1 h at room temperature (RT), washed three times, and then incubated with avidin-biotin complex (ABC) for 1 h.
units.rationale: Details the secondary antibody incubation for DAB staining.

units.title: DAB development with H2O2
units.text:
In this step, the sections were incubated in 0.05% DAB for 1–2 min before addition of 0.01% H2O2 for a further 1–2 min.
Imaging was performed on an inverted Ti2 microscope (Nikon) equipped with a CSU‑W1 spinning‑disc system (Yokogawa), a sCMOS camera (Teledyne Photometrics), and a 20 × objective. An environment control chamber was used to maintain the temperature at 37 °C and CO2 level at 5% during imaging.
units.rationale: Provides the development conditions for DAB visualization.

units.title: Electrophysiological recording parameters
units.text: Electrophysiological recordings were performed with pCLAMP 10.2 software (Molecular Devices); current was filtered at 0.1 kHz and digitized at 2 kHz. Cells with neuronal morphology and round cell body were selected for recordings. Resting‑membrane potentials were monitored immediately after breaking‑in in current‑clamp mode.
units.rationale: Describes the recording setup and criteria for cell selection.

units.title: Single‑cell library preparation and sequencing
units.text: The Chromium Single Cell 3′ Library to generate single cell gel beads in #D0627-1G) and 1 μM DAPT (R&D Systems, #2634) were added to the culture emulsion (GEMs, version 3 chemistry). The resulting libraries were sequenced on either a NextSeq500 or a NovaSeq 6000 with the following specifications Read1 28
units.rationale: Summarizes the single‑cell library construction and sequencing platform.

units.title: cDNA synthesis and quantitative PCR
units.text: cDNA was prepared using reverse transcriptase (Thermo Fisher #K1642, Invitrogen) and random hexamer primers, and quantitative PCR was performed with SYBR Green Master mix (Roche#04887352001) on a LightCycler 480.
units.rationale: Details reverse transcription and qPCR workflow.

units.title: Mechanical detachment of 3D structures at day 10
units.text: At day 10, the resulting 3D structures were mechanically detached from the bottom performed using Image J software (NIH, v1.49).
units.rationale: Specifies the method for harvesting organoids for analysis.
